review_data.title: Great food
review_data.content: They offer a wide variety of food: salads, steaks on hot stone, huge portions of Cordon Bleu, pasta, pizza, delicious desserts. They are open to adjust the order based on the customer's requests (e.g. food allergies). Friendly staff. In the evening, especially during the weekend...More

review_data.title: Very Good Schnitzel
review_data.content: I go there when I am wanting a good Schnitzel or I order for home delivery. The service is also always very good and friendly and during the summer, they have excellent seating are outside

review_data.title: Frisch zubereitetes Essen

review_data.title: A restaurant worth regular visits
review_data.content: We’re regular patrons of this restaurant. Super friendly and fast service, good Italian food, and a relaxed, fun atmosphere keep us coming back.

review_data.title: Very recomendable
review_data.content: The food is good and generous in size. The service is very friendly. Prices like all in Switzerland are little expensive.

review_data.title: Beste Cordon Bleus
review_data.content: die Cordon-Bleus sind der Hammer, die Bedienung sehr freundlich. Das Lokal könnte charmanter eingerichtet sein. Wir kommen garantiert wieder.

review_data.title: Gutes Restaurant
review_data.content: Abwechslungsreiche Speisekarte, helles freundliches Lokal, freundliche Bedienung und preiswert. Preis/ Leistung sehr gut. Pluspunkt: Kaffee geht Mittags meist aufs Haus.

review_data.title: Best service ever
review_data.content: This is great restaurant with very friendly stuff. Good is reasonably priced and the portions are huge.

review_data.title: Our local
review_data.content: This is our local restaurant and we go there very often. Really good food and friendly staff who make you feel like family. Really good value for money. One of the best in Adliswil. Would recommend this spot without hesitation.

review_data.title: Es könnte ein gutes Restaurant sein...

review_data.title: Gerne immer wieder, Weiter so "Genscher und co"
review_data.content: Immer sehr freundlich und lockere Atmosphäre. Aufmerksamer Chef, der weiss was wir gerne mögen. Auch die Küche funktioniert bei Wünschen...More

review_data.title: Great value local - very welcoming
review_data.content: We've been to restaurant Büchel 3 or 4 times now and every time the staff have been consistently welcoming and friendly. The food is very traditional Swiss / Italian combinations. I would guess their speciality is the various cordon bleu, which are large, rich, and...More

review_data.title: Very good
review_data.content: We have been to this restaurant a few times and the quality of the food has always been very high (Cordon Bleu recommended!) and the staff always really polite and helpful.

review_data.title: Friendly service
review_data.content: Good simple food, with many Italian and some Swiss dishes. The restaurant is run by Balkan people who do their best to make sure their guests dine well, are served quickly, and enjoy their stay. Occasionally an order gets mixed up or misunderstood, so if...More

review_data.title: Too be discovered
